name: C. Lengthening Sticks
statement:
You are given three sticks with positive integer lengths of , and
centimeters. You can increase length of some of them by some positive
integer number of centimeters (different sticks can be increased by a
different length), but in total by at most centimeters. In particular,
it is allowed not to increase the length of any stick.Determine the
number of ways to increase the lengths of some sticks so that you can
form from them a non-degenerate (that is, having a positive area)
triangle. Two ways are considered different, if the length of some stick
is increased by different number of centimeters in them.
